title: React 19 Launch Party & Live Coding!
description: Celebrate the release of React 19 with fellow developers! Live demos of new features, Server Components, and React Compiler walkthroughs.
location: Tech Innovation Hub, San Francisco, CA

title: Mastering React Query & Data Fetching Patterns
description: Hands-on workshop focusing on TanStack Query, Suspense integration, and React Router Data APIs. Learn how to build data-driven React apps efficiently.

title: React + TypeScript Best Practices Summit
description: A deep-dive meetup exploring patterns, generics, and scalable architecture for enterprise React applications using TypeScript.

title: Next.js & App Router Workshop
description: Interactive coding session teaching the new Next.js App Router concepts, server actions, and data fetching optimization with React 19.

title: React Performance Optimization Bootcamp
description: Learn advanced performance tuning: React.memo, useCallback, virtualization, and lazy loading for high-performing React apps.

title: Women in React - Global Meetup
description: A welcoming space celebrating women in the React ecosystem. Talks, networking, and mentorship opportunities for all experience levels.

title: React State Management Showdown
description: Redux Toolkit vs Zustand vs Jotai - live coding comparisons and discussions on which pattern best fits your app architecture.
location: Modern JS Center, New York, NY

title: React Architecture & Patterns Conference
description: A full-day event covering compound components, render props, context with reducers, and modern React design systems.

title: Building Scalable UI Systems with Tailwind + React
description: Hands-on design system workshop where you'll create a fully responsive React component library powered by TailwindCSS.

title: ReactSphere Year-End Hackathon
description: Join the ultimate ReactSphere hackathon! Teams build open-source tools or creative apps using React, Next.js, and Vite.
